TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content:
4 hours ago, OzEtkin said:

Birdemic: Sock and Terror- A horror movie where birds attack humans with socks. Hailed as the best horror movie of all time.

(Original: Birdemic: Shock and Terror- one of the worst movies ever)

Bad Tate: About a reallly bad potato (Bad Taste, its creation is considered to be an act of violence)
Eight-egged freaks: eh, any description that doesn't sound gross would be a miracle. (Eight-legged freaks)
independance da: a movie about how to say yes in russian
To Gun: Maverick from Top Gun questions his existence as a pilot in this philosophical thrill ride.

Animal Hose: *Gets sprayed by an angry badger with a fire hose while I say "THANK YOU SIR MAY I HAVE ANOTHER!"*

Groundho Day: A hooker lives the same day over and over again

American Psych!: What if Patrick Bateman was not a psycho killer?

To Story: Woody and Buzz question the nature of their existence and their adventures as a bunch of sentient toys.
Tar wars: Light and Dark sides use Tar as new weapon
Star War: George Lucas stops after just one movie set a long time ago in a galaxy far, far, away.
Smoke and the Bandit: The tale of a pyromaniac who loves creating fires that make lots of smoke... (Smokey and the Bandit)

The Bids

A group of crazed auctioneers terrorize a small New England town....

(The Birds...)

I was actually thinking of 'The Martin' but alas I was too late

The Impsons Movie: A heart-moving story of the sons of an imp who goes on a journey of brotherhood.

The Evil Dad: Dad is evil. 

An man: A documentary about the correct usage of articles

The Bob: From a mysterious alien landing site, a man named Bob emerges.

All-E: EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

201: A Space Odyssey: The Roman empire starts a space...

 

 

odyssey.

*bad- um tiss*
Great scape: A Elvis Presley great album

Psych - A film about a guy running an old hotel where lots of practical jokes happen.

BT man - a film detailing the exploits of a phone engineer

BT man begins - about the birth of a phone engineer.

Edited July 24, 2016 by John FX

Never say Ever: And then they lived happily after

The Fantastic For: A romance movie(at least it sounds like one)

About Tim: A man named Tim can warp through time by standing in any dark enclosed space.

Beauty and the Bast: an alternate version of the Disney classic where the Beast and Bastone switch roles.

Life o Pi: a musical about people who like pie and celebrate Pi Day.

Hoo: was that an owl?

Rave: how to throw awesome parties.

Iron Man Tree: Tony Stark's suit becomes part tree.

Oy Story: someone is trying to get your attention!
La Bamb - where you throw bombs at Richie Valens for making the song La Bamba
Hostbusters: Pranking party hosts
Dr. Stranelove

Tinti: http://www.tinti.eu/en/products

(Tintin)

Ant-Ma: The motion picture we've all been waiting for... Ant Man's mother tries on the ant-man suit, but ends up fighting terrorists while it is still being borrowed.

Finding Neo: A story of the human race's technology and exploration progression around the time of New World colonization

DiverGen: A documentary on diving technology and advancements in undersea exploration

CE Age: History from 0 onwards

Harry Otter: The most boring and slightly amusing documentary on otters in existence, focusing on their hair.

Spier Man: A James Bond-alike character becomes a proficient spy complete with fancy gadgets (We don't need parachutes, that's what lithobraking bags are for! Landing quickly and in style!) that sometimes break the laws of physics!

The Ego Movie: Large corporation masters with large egos dominate this globe.

The Leg Movie: Part of a complete exercising training course series, this one focuses on leg strength and running.
Life of i: The mathematician from Finding Dry gets stuck in a boat again, but this time he has to teach a metaphorical tiger about complex numbers for some reason.
Ion man: Man full of Radiation

Sorry if someone has done this already, I'm too lazy to look through all of this.

Turns out that I just looked up a few posts and found it. Whoops!

Another try!

Transformers: Dark of the Moo

A robotic cow turns evil and tries to rule the world.

Edited July 26, 2016 by The Raging Sandwich
Copying

Oy Story:

The story of an Austrailian dude who yells "Oy!" at people in public and tries to avoid arrest.
Transformer: Luke goes to Tosche Station to pick up some power converters.
